# Client Guides

---

Client guides are role specific guides for pages that can be accessed after signing in an account that has client-role.

Check the following links to look for guides related to these Client-role specific pages.

- [Sign Up](./client-sign-up.md)
- [Sign In](./client-sign-in.md)
- [Sign Out](./client-sign-out.md)
- [Find Counsellor](./find-counsellor.md)
- [View Profile Menu](./view-profile-menu.md)
- [View Profile](./view-profile.md)
- [Edit Profile](./edit-profile.md)
- [View Counsellor List](./view-counsellor-list.md)
- [Book Session](./book-session.md)
- [Switch Roles](./switch-roles.md)
- [Change Password](./change-password.md)
- [Change Timezone](./change-timezone.md)
- [Recommend Counsellor](./recommend-counsellor.md)
- [View Upcoming Sessions](./view-upcoming-sessions.md)
- [View Completed Sessions](./view-completed-sessions.md)
- [View Cancelled Sessions](./view-completed-sessions.md)
- [Reschedule Session](./reschedule-session.md)
- [Buy Subscription](./buy-subscription.md)
- [Update Subscription](./update-subscription.md)
- [Cancel Subscription](./cancel-subscription.md)
- [View Subscription Details](./view-subscription-details.md)
- [Chat with Counsellor](./chat-with-counsellor.md)
